problem_summary: Disputes related to rent, eviction, or maintenance between tenant and landlord.

step_by_step_procedure.description: Check the rental agreement for terms and conditions.
Communicate the issue in writing to the landlord or tenant.
Send a written notice if the issue continues.
Approach local rent authority or housing department.
File a complaint before the appropriate court if required.
